content: of the 1st single_crochet and pull through color c cut color a 16 single_crochet © bokky bag by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 6 round 3 c crochet over the yarn end of color c remember double_crochet in fl only remember the 1st aeer the chain 1 is made in the next st do not skip a st behind any double_crochet all fl of round 1 should have 1 double_crochet made into it at the end of this round see 1st photo below for placement of the last double_crochet see 2nd photo below for placement of the last single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1sc single_crochet and pull through color b 16 single_crochet 8 double_crochet round 4 b crochet over the yarn end of color b do not skip a st behind any double_crochet for placement of the last double_crochet see the 2nd photo below for placement of the last single_crochet see the 3rd photo below chain 1 2 single_crochet the 1st single_crochet is made in the double_crochet of round 3 double_crochet in the single_crochet of round 2 single_crochet in the single_crochet of round 3 x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through color c 24 single_crochet 8 double_crochet © bokky bag by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 7 round 5 c no increases are made in this round this means skip 1 st behind each double_crochet for placement of the last double_crochet see the photo below chain 1 3 single_crochet the 2nd single_crochet is made in the double_crochet of round 4 double_crochet the double_crochet is made in the double_crochet of round 3 x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st single_crochet and pull through color b 24 single_crochet 8 double_crochet round 6 b do not skip a st behind any double_crochet for placement of the last single_crochet see the photo below chain 1 double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet 3 single_crochet the 2nd single_crochet is made in the double_crochet of round 5 x 8 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st double_crochet and pull through color c 32 single_crochet 16 double_crochet © bokky bag by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2023 8 from here onwards 1 st is skipped behind each double_crochet or double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet round 7 c all double_crochet are made in single_crochet of round 5 they are hiding behind the double_crochet of round 6 see 1 st photo below for placement of the last double_crochet see the 2nd photo below for placement of the last single_crochet see the 3rd photo below chain 1 double_crochet single_crochet x 24 slip_stitch in the bl of the 1st double_crochet
